name: Warrior Lords
description:
Warrior Lords offers a furious medieval arcade experience, drawing inspiration from classic beat 'em ups. Battle through Western Europe wielding cold steel, delivering powerful kicks and summoning dragons. Choose from 6 unique heroes and defeat your rivals in a quest for supremacy.





FEATURES


  • Arcade Beat 'Em Up Action: Fight your way through medieval europe in a fast paced arcade brawler.
  • Play as one of six unique heroes: Use special abilities and unique movesets. Summon dragons, fireballs and literal lightning storms to beat your enemies.
  • Two Player Local Co-Op: The game features any-time drop-in co-op. Just press start!
  • Customizable Gameplay: Customize the gamespeed and difficulty to match your style of play.
  • Keyboard and Controller support: Play local multiplayer using the keyboard and controller for both players.



One playthrough of the arcade campaign approximately takes 30 - 60 minutes without dying on medium difficulty.
